summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of the hashfile state management component, covering inode retrieval, detection of unused hard links, removal of links, normal state operations, and handling of overflow conditions.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable tracking and deduplication of data files within the DVC system by ensuring the state handling logic correctly manages file identifiers, link lifecycles, and edgeâ€‘case overflow scenarios, thereby preserving data integrity and storage efficiency.
